AUTOPAGER Rules FOR FLICKR:
=======================================================================================================
=======================================================================================================

=== Work well with Autopager (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/autopager)

=== Rule : (Copy the code and in Autoptager configuration Panel > chose Import/Export->Import From Clipboard )

=============================== Flickr Archives ===============================
<autopager>
<site><urlPattern>http://www.flickr.com/photos/*/archives/date-taken/*</urlPattern>
<guid>F548B43D-A953-6920-05E4-85A2-E54A-AA21</guid>
<margin>1</margin>
<owner>bruno3</owner>
<enableJS>false</enableJS>
<quickLoad>true</quickLoad>
<contentXPath>//div[@id='Main' and table[1]/@id='SubNav']</contentXPath>
<testLink>http://www.flickr.com/photos/89352921@N00/archives/date-taken/</testLink>
<removeXPath>//table[@id='SubNav']</removeXPath>
<removeXPath>//table[@class='ArchiveNavi']</removeXPath>
<linkXPath>//a[@class='Next' and (text()='next →')]</linkXPath>
<desc>Flickr - Archives -
http://www.flickr.com/photos/21172551@N00/archives/date-taken/</desc>
</site>
</autopager>

=============================== Flickr POOL ========================================
<autopager>
<site><urlPattern>http://.*flickr.com/groups/[^/]+/pool/</urlPattern>
<guid>http://.*flickr.com/groups/[^/]+/pool/</guid>
<margin>2</margin>
<owner>autopagerize</owner>
<urlIsRegex>true</urlIsRegex>
<enableJS>2</enableJS>
<quickLoad>true</quickLoad>
<contentXPath>//div[@class="HoldPhotos"]</contentXPath>
<linkXPath>//a[@class="Next"]</linkXPath>
<desc>Flickr- POOL - Autopager Rule </desc>
</site>
</autopager>

============================== Flickr FAV's - Square - Small - Medium - Large) ======
<autopager>
<site><urlPattern>http://www.flickr.com/photos/*/favorites/*</urlPattern>
<guid>A6C0E1C1-6B7C-5AE7-DA37-F62F-4FC0-B710</guid>
<margin>1</margin>
<owner>bruno3</owner>
<lazyImgSrc>data-defer-src</lazyImgSrc>
<enableJS>2</enableJS>
<quickLoad>true</quickLoad>
<contentXPath>//div[@id='main']</contentXPath>
<contentXPath>//div[@id='faves' and @class='sq photo-display-container clearfix']</contentXPath>
<contentXPath>//div[@id='faves' and @class='md photo-display-container clearfix']</contentXPath>
<testLink>http://www.flickr.com/photos/doposbronza/favorites/?view=sm</testLink>
<removeXPath>//table[@id='SubNav']</removeXPath>
<removeXPath>//div[@id='fave-options']</removeXPath>
<linkXPath>//a[@class='Next' and (text()='next →')]</linkXPath>
<desc>Flickr FAV's - square - Small - Medium - Large -
</desc>
</site>
</autopager>
